title: How to Make a New Animal in Animal Jam

steps.headline: Log into your Animal Jam account.
steps.description: If you don't have an account, make sure you create one.

steps.headline: Click on the switch animals button in the bottom left corner.
steps.description: It's a light blue circle with a koala on top and a monkey on the bottom, with 2 yellow arrows on the right and left side of them.

steps.headline: Click on create a new animal or recycle one of your animals.
steps.description: You can do this by clicking the light blue circle with a lighter blue recycling can in the bottom right corner, then clicking on the animal you want to recycle.

steps.headline: Choose your animal.
steps.description: You don't have access to animals that are members only if you're a non member. You can't buy an animal that is traveling or endangered.

steps.headline: Click next.
steps.description: Use the arrow keys to scroll through the names and choose a name for your animal. Click the lever on the right to get a random name.

steps.headline: Click the buy button.
steps.description: This means you will pay 1,000 gems, 5 diamonds, or 10 diamonds for your new animal!

steps.headline: Now you can change the colors and put the clothes on your animal!
steps.description: This will make you look awesome.

text: Log into your Animal Jam account. If you don't have an account, make sure you create one. Click on the switch animals button in the bottom left corner. It's a light blue circle with a koala on top and a monkey on the bottom, with 2 yellow arrows on the right and left side of them. Click on create a new animal or recycle one of your animals. You can do this by clicking the light blue circle with a lighter blue recycling can in the bottom right corner, then clicking on the animal you want to recycle. Choose your animal. You don't have access to animals that are members only if you're a non member. You can't buy an animal that is traveling or endangered. Click next. Use the arrow keys to scroll through the names and choose a name for your animal. Click the lever on the right to get a random name. Click the buy button. This means you will pay 1,000 gems, 5 diamonds, or 10 diamonds for your new animal! Now you can change the colors and put the clothes on your animal! This will make you look awesome.
sentences: Log into your Animal Jam account.
If you don't have an account, make sure you create one.
Click on the switch animals button in the bottom left corner.
It's a light blue circle with a koala on top and a monkey on the bottom, with 2 yellow arrows on the right and left side of them.
Click on create a new animal or recycle one of your animals.
You can do this by clicking the light blue circle with a lighter blue recycling can in the bottom right corner, then clicking on the animal you want to recycle.
You don't have access to animals that are members only if you're a non member.
You can't buy an animal that is traveling or endangered.
Use the arrow keys to scroll through the names and choose a name for your animal.
Click the lever on the right to get a random name.
This means you will pay 1,000 gems, 5 diamonds, or 10 diamonds for your new animal!
Now you can change the colors and put the clothes on your animal!
This will make you look awesome.
